--- title: "Love Luton" date: "2019-10-27" author: "Adrian Joseph" image: https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport_small/2019-10-27_LOVE_LUTON/img/00.png categories: [race report, run] format: html lightbox: match: auto effect: fade desc-position: right loop: false --- ![](https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport_small/2019-10-27_LOVE_LUTON/img/00.png) The only thing I remember of this race is that the start was not anywere near to the finish. I had to walk quite a bit to go back to the car. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
